name: ARMANI CODE COLONIA
description: "I believe that a man is elegant when he is discreet in his choice of clothing and knows how to wear even casual outfits with ease and effortlessness." – Giorgio Armani. Stylish, charming, powerful, irresistible – Code.
ingredients: ['Bergamot', 'Orange Blossom', 'Amberwood', 'Mandarin', 'Salicylate (Floral notes)', 'Clary Sage', 'Heliotrope', 'Pink Pepper', 'Tonka Bean', 'Woody Notes']
